Standard: Now, you have picked the 11 best rockets.
CH: 现在你已经选出了十一个最好的火箭。

Standard: We are going to launch them into the space, with the hope of human being.
CH: 我们马上将要把他们发射到太空中，带着全人类的希望！

Standard: Because the earth is exploding. And you need to run as ffast as possible.
CH: 因为地球将要爆炸了！你们必须不被炸到！

Standard: Use left and right arrows to move the rockets.
CH: 键盘左右按键移动火箭。

Standard: Collect the resource and avoid the asteroid from space.
CH: 途中，你们要获取资源，躲避陨石。

Standard: When you see letters like this: type the letter one by one to use the special powups!Try it
CH: 当你们看到如上面出现一串字母，按顺序把它们打出来便可使用超能力！现在试一试

Standard: Ok! hurry up! Rocket girls is going to save the world!
CH: 好了！快走吧！火箭少女拯救世界！
